Package edu.vt.middleware.password

Interface Summary
PasswordRule PasswordRule allows custom password rules to be created for determining whether or not a password is strong.
 

Class Summary
AbstractDigestRule AbstractDigestRule provides core methods for password rules that use a digest.
AbstractPasswordRule AbstractPasswordRule provides a simple implementation of a password rule.
Password Password contains functions for determining what type and what quantity of characters a password contains.
PasswordCharacterRule PasswordCharacterRule contains methods for determining if a password contains the desired mix of character types.
PasswordChecker PasswordChecker contains methods for setting pasword rules and then determining if a password meets the requirements of all the rules.
PasswordDictionaryRule PasswordDictionaryRule contains methods for determining if a password contains a dictionary word of a specified length, forwards or backwards.
PasswordGenerator PasswordGenerator creates password that meet password rule criteria.
PasswordHistoryRule PasswordHistoryRule contains methods for determining if a password matches one of any previous password a user has choosen.
PasswordLengthRule PasswordLengthRule contains methods for determining if a password is within a desired length.
PasswordSequenceRule PasswordSequenceRule contains methods for determining if a password contains common keyboard sequences.
PasswordSourceRule PasswordSourceRule contains methods for determining if a password matches a password from a different source.
PasswordUserIDRule PasswordUserIDRule contains methods for determining if a password contains the user id associated with that password.
PasswordWhitespaceRule PasswordWhitespaceRule contains methods for determining if a password contains whitespace characters.
 

Exception Summary
PasswordException PasswordException is used to determine why a password did not meet the requirements of a password rule.
